## Open Research in Practice

::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"}
-   [Quarto](https://quarto.org) projects and documents.

-   Version control with [git](https://git-scm.com).

-   Online repository with [GitHub](https://github.com) or [GitLab](https://about.gitlab.com).

-   Online project management with the [Open Science Framework](https://osf.io).

-   Sharing manuscripts on [preprint servers](https://spi-hub.app.vumc.org/pp-service/browse).

-   License your work for reuse.
:::
